item.description:
The Hanover Theater Opens at 7:30 PM

So I plan to be at McFaddens from 6:30 - 7:20 and then walk over to the Hanover Theater



Warren Miller movies are the gold standard for all ski/snowboard movies. Every Fall for 50 years the Warren Miller team has toured the country to show off its latest creation. It is not just a movie, its an event. This year the movie is titled "Dynasty" and the preview looks awesome.

$20 may seem like a lot for a movie BUT you get several 2 for 1 lift tickets and other give-aways. You will make back your admission price - most years i go twice just to get the deals :). I will be at Somerville the following week!

The movie starts at 8pm but we will meet at McFaddens for beers and apps before the show and go over as a group. This will be a great way to meet members of this meet up and make some connections before the snow starts falling.

Buy your tickets on your own as soon as possible, it will sell out - http://www.thehanover...

For more info on the movie and giveaways check out - http://www.skinet.com...
item.name: Warren Miller Movie in Worcester - Hanover Theater
